{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Rosewill |model=RNX-EasyN4 |revision= |upc=898745018103 |ean= |asin=B002POHFQG |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/13/2008 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR97908003 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, pinout marked,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6693;884, 6693, A913;2; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt (unofficially) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=RosewillXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Rosewill[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F |default_ch= }} {{ProductPage|http://www.rosewill.com/products/1281/productDetail.htm}}
This router is flashable to '''DD-WRT''' or '''OpenWrt''' (trunk, the ESR-9753 build seems to work fine), however, this will require serial access. There is no firmware currently available to allow flashing via the webGUI ([http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=54802&start=30 see this forum thread for a utility to work with the firmware format]).
The default SSID is '''RosewillXXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address (assumed capitalized hex letters).
==Additional external links== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=367964 ''Rosewill RNX-Easy4N'' on the '''DD-WRT''' Forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=66804 ''Rosewill RNX-EasyN400 DD-WRT?'' on the '''DD-WRT''' Forums] (w/ internal shot) :"ESR-9752-1.00 LFP 7016A0251000" is silkscreened on the board shown.
